title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results are not being selected in external jar, Build 200201151. When searching for references to the field 'tmpFir' in java.io.File, the search results are not appropriately selected.
OB: When searching for references to the field 'tmpFir' in java.io.File, the search results are not selected.
EB: When searching for references to the field 'tmpFir' in java.io.File, the search results should be selected.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 set as the default JRE and ensure you have the source for rt.jar. 2. Open java.io.File. 3. Search for references to the field 'tmpFir'. 4. Verify that the search results are not selected.
